Logging.LogLevel: Choose one of: trace, debug, info, warning, error, critical, off.

User Details.Username: The Name that should appear in the logs

Arrow.Enable Arrow Patch: Ultimate Kill Switch For All Arrow Stuff

Change Gravity.Enable: If Enabled, Will Change Base Gravity of all Arrows
Change Gravity.Gravity: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 0.0

Change Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Will Change Base Speed of all Arrows
Change Speed.Speed: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 9000.0

Limit Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Makes Sure All Arrow's Base Speed lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Limit Speed.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 3000.0
Limit Speed.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 12000.0

Randomize Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Randomizes All Arrow's Base Speed to lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Randomize Speed.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 3000.0
Randomize Speed.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 12000.0

Limit Damage.Enable: If Enabled, Makes Sure All Arrow's Base Damage lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Limit Damage.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 10.0
Limit Damage.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 1000.0

Change Sound Level.Enable: If Enabled, Changes Sound Level of All Arrows to one of below
Change Sound Level.Sound Level: Choose one of: kLoud, kNormal, kSilent, kVeryLoud, kQuiet

Bolt.Enable Bolt Patch: Ultimate Kill Switch For All Bolt Stuff

Change Gravity.Enable: If Enabled, Will Change Base Gravity of all Bolts
Change Gravity.Gravity: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 0.0

Change Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Will Change Base Speed of all Bolts
Change Speed.Speed: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 10800.0

Limit Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Makes Sure All Bolt's Base Speed lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Limit Speed.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 4000.0
Limit Speed.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 12000.0

Randomize Speed.Enable: If Enabled, Randomizes All Bolt's Base Speed to lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Randomize Speed.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 3000.0
Randomize Speed.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 12000.0

Limit Damage.Enable: If Enabled, Makes Sure All Bolt's Base Damage lie inbetween "Min" and "Max" Values.
Limit Damage.Min: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 10.0
Limit Damage.Max: Set to a floating point(i.e., decimal) value, e.g., 1000.0

Change Sound Level.Enable: If Enabled, Changes Sound Level of All Bolts to one of below
Change Sound Level.Sound Level: Choose one of: kLoud, kNormal, kSilent, kVeryLoud, kQuiet
